name: Ghost Hospital -in Thousand Horror Hill
description:
The main character walks around a hospital in a magical world to search for his friend who disappeared into another world.
The game is a exploration adventure in which the main character roams around a hospital in a magical world in search of a friend who has disappeared into another world.

The Genre Is Based On A Comical Atmosphere,

A bit of horror awaits as you progress deeper into the story.
How many friends will be saved is up to you[/u].

Estimated Play Time.

5 to 10 Hours For A Sweet Exploration　

15 Hours to Xx Hours to Complete All Endings.


You can check the volume of the background music and play a test movie from "Game Test" at the bottom of the menu.

Controls

Direction Key: Move Character

Space Enter: Decide Speak Up Look Up

X Key Esc Key: Cancel Back Call Up Menu
